title: Textile
medium:
Medium:
Technique: resist printed on plain weave and immersion dyed in indigo
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 51 x 40 cm (20 1/16 x 15 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 25 x 79 cm (9 13/16 x 31 1/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 17 x 85.5 cm (6 11/16 x 33 11/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (d): 51.5 x 26 cm (20 1/4 x 10 1/4 in.)
description: Fragments of a blue resist floral pattern. A, B and C are from the same piece. D is from another length of fabric. A, B and C together re-create the entire pattern.
